snippet.title: Halloween Classic Games: Vampire Boy
snippet.description: Vampire Boy is a 2001 classic platformer created by RobotDuck. You play as Vampire kid named "Villiam" who must collect candies hidden by his mean sister in his castle on Halloween. This is another favorite classic of mine, and I was glad to find it again on Bluemaxia's flash point. You can find it there along with a whole lot of other flash games to play if you would like to try. This is a playthrough of levels 1-10 as I got stuck on the last one at the end, whoops. So I just ended it and left it at that. But this is a fun game and a classic to remember.
